Uses of Package
shef.mt.features.util

Packages that use shef.mt.features.util
shef.mt.aren Package containing classes specific to the Arabic-to-English translation project 
shef.mt.features.impl   
shef.mt.features.impl.bb This package contains implementations of Blackbox features. 
shef.mt.features.impl.gb This package contains implementations of Glassbox features 
shef.mt.features.util   
shef.mt.tools This package contains wrappers for various pre-processing tools and Processor classes for interpreting the output of the tools 
shef.mt.tools.stf This package contains classes that provide access to the stanford parser output 
shef.mt.xmlwrap This package contains XML wrappers around the output of the IBM and CMU systems 
 

Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.aren
FeatureManager
          The FeatureManager controls the loading, instantiation and running of the features.
 

Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.features.impl
Sentence
          Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.
 

Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.features.impl.bb
Sentence
          Models a sentence as a span of text containing multiple information added by pre-processing tools
It provides direct access to well used features of a sentence, such as its text, tokens, ngrams, phrases, but also allows any tool to add information related to the sentence via the setValue() method.

Classes in shef.mt.features.util used by shef.mt.features.util
FeatureArgumentException
           
FeatureLoader
          A FeatureLoader is responisble for instantiating Feature objects from a list of feature indeces
Phrase
          Models a translation phrase as a span of text starting and ending at given positions in the input

Translation
          This class encapsulates information about translations in an n-best list
